1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
3{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
4{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
5
6-- | Textual class.
7
8module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Text.Textual
9  ( Textual (..),
10    stringify,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Data.Char                              as Ch
14import qualified Data.String                            as Str
15import qualified Data.Text                              as Tx
16import qualified Data.Text.Encoding                     as Tx
17import qualified Data.Text.Encoding.Error               as Err
18import qualified Data.Text.Lazy                         as Tz
19import qualified Data.Text.Lazy.Encoding                as Tz
20import qualified Data.ByteString.UTF8                   as Bs
21import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy                   as Bz
22import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy.UTF8              as Bz
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Infix         as O
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Misc          as O
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Shorthand     as O
26
27-- | Text-like value.
28class (Show t, Eq t, Ord t, Monoid t, Str.IsString t) => Textual t where
29
30    -- ----------------------  Monoid
31
32    -- | Empty text.
33    --
34    --   >>> tEmpty :: String
35    --   ""
36    --
37    tEmpty :: t
38    tEmpty = mempty
39
40    -- | Test text is empty.
41    --
42    --   >>> tIsEmpty ""
43    --   True
44    --
45    --   >>> tIsEmpty "foo"
46    --   False
47    --
48    tIsEmpty :: t -> Bool
49    tIsEmpty = (== tEmpty)
50
51    -- | Append two texts.
52    --
53    --   >>> tJoin "foo" "bar"
54    --   "foobar"
55    --
56    tJoin :: t -> t -> t
57    tJoin = mappend
58
59    -- | Append multiple texts.
60    --
61    --   >>> tJoinAll ["foo", "bar", "baz"]
62    --   "foobarbaz"
63    --
64    tJoinAll :: [t] -> t
65    tJoinAll = mconcat
66
67    -- | Append multiple texts with separator.
68    --
69    --   >>> tJoinWith " | " ["foo", "bar", "baz"]
70    --   "foo | bar | baz"
71    --
72    tJoinWith :: t -> [t] -> t
73    tJoinWith tw = first where
74        first (t : ts) = t `tJoin` loop ts
75        first [] = tEmpty
76
77        loop (t : ts) = tw `tJoin` t `tJoin` loop ts
78        loop [] = tEmpty
79
80    -- | Append multiple texts with space.
81    --
82    --   >>> tUnwords ["foo", "bar", "baz"]
83    --   "foo bar baz"
84    --
85    tUnwords :: [t] -> t
86    tUnwords = tJoinWith " "
87
88    -- ----------------------  Subtext
89
90    -- | Preppend character to text.
91    --
92    --   >>> tAdd 'g' "foo"
93    --   "gfoo"
94    --
95    tAdd :: Char -> t -> t
96
97    -- | Preppend two characters to text.
98    --
99    --   >>> tAdd2 'b' 'a' "foo"
100    --   "bafoo"
101    --
102    tAdd2 :: Char -> Char -> t -> t
103    tAdd2 c d = tAdd c . tAdd d
104
105    -- | Preppend two characters to text.
106    --
107    --   >>> tAdd3 'b' 'a' 'r' "foo"
108    --   "barfoo"
109    --
110    tAdd3 :: Char -> Char ->  Char -> t -> t
111    tAdd3 c d e = tAdd c . tAdd2 d e
112
113    -- | Split text into first character and rest of text.
114    --
115    --   >>> tCut "foo"
116    --   Just ('f',"oo")
117    --
118    --   >>> tCut ""
119    --   Nothing
120    --
121    tCut :: t -> Maybe (Char, t)
122
123    -- | Split one or two characters.
124    --
125    --   >>> tCut2 "bar"
126    --   Just ('b', Just ('a', "r"))
127    --
128    tCut2 :: t -> Maybe (Char, Maybe (Char, t))
129    tCut2 a = tCut O.<$$> tCut a
130
131    -- | Split one, two, or three characters.
132    --
133    --   >>> tCut3 "bar"
134    --   Just ('b', Just ('a', Just ('r', "")))
135    --
136    --   >>> tCut3 "b"
137    --   Just ('b', Nothing)
138    --
139    tCut3 :: t -> Maybe (Char, Maybe (Char, Maybe (Char, t)))
140    tCut3 a = tCut2 O.<$$> tCut a
141
142    -- | Take /N-#1/ characters from /text-#2/.
143    --
144    --   >>> tTake 3 "foobar"
145    --   "foo"
146    --
147    tTake :: Int -> t -> t
148
149    -- | Drop /N-#1/ characters from /text-#2/.
150    --
151    --   >>> tDrop 3 "foobar"
152    --   "bar"
153    --
154    tDrop :: Int -> t -> t
155
156    -- | Drop /prefix-#1/ from /text-#2/.
157    --
158    --   >>> tDropPrefix "foo" "foobar"
159    --   Just "bar"
160    --
161    --   >>> tDropPrefix "bar" "foobar"
162    --   Nothing
163    --
164    tDropPrefix :: (Textual a) => a -> t -> Maybe t
165    tDropPrefix (tCut -> Just (c, cs)) (tCut -> Just (a, as))
166        | c == a       = tDropPrefix cs as
167        | otherwise    = Nothing
168    tDropPrefix cs as
169        | tIsEmpty cs  = Just as
170        | otherwise    = Nothing
171
172    -- | Map /function-#1/ to characters of /text-value-#2/.
173    tMap :: (Char -> Char) -> t -> t
174    tMap f = loop where
175        loop (tCut -> Just (c, cs)) = f c `tAdd` loop cs
176        loop _ = tEmpty
177
178    -- | Map /function-#1/ to characters of /text-value-#2/.
179    --
180    --   >>> tList fromEnum "bar"
181    --   [98,97,114]
182    --
183    tList :: (Char -> a) -> t -> [a]
184    tList f = loop where
185        loop (tCut -> Just (c, cs)) = f c : loop cs
186        loop _ = []
187
188    -- | Test all characters of text value.
189    --
190    --   >>> tAll (`elem` "0123456789.") "120.5"
191    --   True
192    --
193    --   >>> tAll (`elem` "0123456789.") "120,000"
194    --   False
195    --
196    tAll :: (Char -> Bool) -> t -> Bool
197    tAll f = and . tList f
198
199    -- | Length of /textual-value-#1/.
200    --
201    --   >>> tLength "foo" :: Int
202    --   3
203    --
204    tLength :: (Integral n) => t -> n
205    tLength (tCut -> Just (_, t)) = 1 + tLength t
206    tLength _ = 0
207
208    -- ----------------------  Divide and split
209
210    -- | Take subtext from /textual-value-#2/ while /tester-#1/ holds,
211    --   and pairing the subtext with after.
212    --
213    --   >>> tWhile (/= ' ') "foo bar baz"
214    --   ("foo", " bar baz")
215    --
216    tWhile :: (Char -> Bool) -> t -> (t, t)
217    tWhile f t0 = loop 0 t0 where
218        loop n (tCut -> Just (c, t)) | f c = loop (n + 1) t
219        loop n t = (tTake n t0, t)
220
221    -- | Take subtext from /textual-value-#2/ while /tester-#1/ do not holds.
222    --
223    --   > tWhileNot f t = tWhile (not . f) t
224    --
225    tWhileNot :: (Char -> Bool) -> t -> (t, t)
226    tWhileNot f = tWhile (not . f)
227
228    -- | Divide /textual-value-#2/ to textual list by /delimiter-tester-#1/.
229    --
230    --   >>> tDivide (== '/') "foo/bar/baz"
231    --   ["foo","bar","baz"]
232    --
233    tDivide :: (Char -> Bool) -> t -> [t]
234    tDivide f t0 = loop (0 :: Int) t0 where
235        loop n (tCut -> Just (c, t))
236            | f c        = tTake n t0 : tDivide f t
237            | otherwise  = loop (n + 1) t
238        loop n _ = [tTake n t0]
239
240    -- | Divide text into words.
241    --
242    --   >>> tWords "a bb  ccc "
243    --   ["a", "bb", "ccc"]
244    --
245    tWords :: t -> [t]
246    tWords = tWordsBy Ch.isSpace
247
248    -- | Divide text into words by character tester.
249    --
250    --   >>> tWordsBy (== '|') "a|bb||ccc|"
251    --   ["a", "bb", "ccc"]
252    --
253    tWordsBy :: (Char -> Bool) -> t -> [t]
254    tWordsBy f t0 = loop (0 :: Int) t0 where
255        loop n (tCut -> Just (c, t))
256            | f c        = tTake n t0 : (tWordsBy f $ snd $ tWhile f t)
257            | otherwise  = loop (n + 1) t
258        loop 0 _ = []
259        loop n _ = [tTake n t0]
260
261    -- ----------------------  Creation
262
263    -- | Create text from single character.
264    --
265    --   >>> charT 'b' :: String
266    --   "b"
267    --
268    charT :: Char -> t
269    charT c = tAdd c tEmpty
270
271    -- | Create text from two characters.
272    --
273    --   >>> char2T 'b' 'a' :: String
274    --   "ba"
275    --
276    char2T :: Char -> Char -> t
277    char2T c d = tAdd2 c d tEmpty
278
279    -- | Create text from three characters.
280    --
281    --   >>> char3T 'b' 'a' 'r' :: String
282    --   "bar"
283    --
284    char3T :: Char -> Char -> Char -> t
285    char3T c d e = tAdd3 c d e tEmpty
286
287    -- | /N/-length textual value.
288    --
289    --   >>> charsT 4 '+' :: String
290    --   "++++"
291    --
292    charsT :: Int -> Char -> t
293    charsT n c | n > 0     = tAdd c $ charsT (n - 1) c
294               | otherwise = tEmpty
295
296    -- ----------------------  Conversion
297
298    -- | Convert textual value to string.
299    --
300    --   >>> tString "foo"
301    --   "foo"
302    --
303    tString :: t -> String
304
305    -- | Convert string to textual value.
306    --
307    --   >>> stringT "foo" :: String
308    --   "foo"
309    --
310    stringT :: String -> t
311
312    -- | Convert show instance to textual value.
313    --
314    --   >>> showT (120 :: Int) :: String
315    --   "120"
316    --
317    showT :: (Show a) => a -> t
318    showT = stringT . show
319
320    -- | Convert strict bytestring to textual value.
321    bsT :: O.Bs -> t
322    bsT = bzT . Bz.fromStrict
323
324    -- | Convert lazy bytestring to textual value.
325    bzT :: O.Bz -> t
326    bzT = bsT . Bz.toStrict
327
328instance Textual String where
329    tEmpty       = ""
330    tIsEmpty     = null
331    tJoin        = (++)
332    tAdd         = (:)
333    tCut         = O.uncons
334    tTake        = take
335    tDrop        = drop
336
337    tString      = id
338    stringT      = id
339    bsT          = Bs.toString
340    bzT          = Bz.toString
341
342-- | Strict text.
343instance Textual O.Tx where
344    tEmpty       = Tx.empty
345    tIsEmpty     = Tx.null
346    tJoin        = Tx.append
347
348    tAdd         = Tx.cons
349    tCut         = Tx.uncons
350    tTake        = Tx.take
351    tDrop        = Tx.drop
352
353    tString      = Tx.unpack
354    stringT      = Tx.pack
355    bsT          = Tx.decodeUtf8With Err.lenientDecode
356    bzT          = bsT . Bz.toStrict
357
358-- | Lazy text.
359instance Textual O.Tz where
360    tEmpty       = Tz.empty
361    tIsEmpty     = Tz.null
362    tJoin        = Tz.append
363
364    tAdd         = Tz.cons
365    tCut         = Tz.uncons
366    tTake        = Tz.take . fromIntegral
367    tDrop        = Tz.drop . fromIntegral
368
369    tString      = Tz.unpack
370    stringT      = Tz.pack
371    bsT          = bzT . Bz.fromStrict
372    bzT          = Tz.decodeUtf8With Err.lenientDecode
373
374-- | Convert textual something to string something.
375stringify :: (Functor f, Textual t) => f t -> f String
376stringify = (tString <$>)
377
